Ball - Class in main.java.model
Ball is an abstract class that handles the ball movement in game.
Ball(Point2D, int, int, Color, Color) - Constructor for class main.java.model.Ball
Ball constructor creates the ball as well as handles the ball movement Set the initial speed of ball of x and y direction to 0 at the start of the game.

it resets the position of player bar and ball it then resets the direction of ball movement, and ballLost to false
